Unique Units here<-->
Longbowman Longbowman British unique unit. Powerful archer with long range. Britons Archer
Cataphract Cataphract Byzantine unique unit. Heavily armored cavalry. Byzantines Cavalry
Woad Raider WoadRaider Celtic unique unit. Exceptionally quick infantry. Celts Infantry
Chu Ko Nu ChuKoNu Chinese unique unit. Archer with mediocre range. Fires large number of arrows very quickly. Chinese Archer
Throwing Axeman ThrowingAxeman Frankish unique unit. Infantry with ranged attack. Franks Infantry
Huskarl Huskarl Gothic unique unit. Infantry with substantial pierce armor, virtually immune to archer fire. Goths Infantry
Samurai Samurai Japanese unique unit. Infantry with fast attack. Japanese Infantry
Mangudai Mangudai Mongol unique unit. Cavalry archer with attack bonus vs. siege weapons. Mongols Archer, Cavalry
War Elephant WarElephant Persian unique unit. Slow, powerful, strong, and well-armored cavalry. Persians Cavalry
Mameluke Mameluke Saracen unique unit. Camel with hand-to-hand attack at distance. Excels vs. other mounted units. Saracens Cavalry
Teutonic Knight TeutonicKnight Teutonic unique unit. Infantry with effective armor and slow but powerful attack. Teutons Infantry
Janissary Janissary Turkish unique unit. Hand Cannoneer with longer range and no minimum range. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range. Turks Gunpowder
Berserk Berserk Viking unique unit. Infantry that slowly heals itself. Vikings Infantry
Longboat Longboat Viking unique unit. Fires multiple arrows. Vikings Naval Vessel
Jaguar Jaguar Aztec unique unit. Attack bonus vs. other infantry. Aztecs Infantry
Tarkan Tarkan Hun unique unit. Cavalry with attack bonus vs. buildings. Huns Cavalry
War Wagon War Wagon Korean unique unit. Heavily armored horse-drawn archer unit. Koreans Archer, Cavalry
Turtle Ship TurtleShip Korean unique unit. Slow, ironclad battleship used to destroy other ships at close range. Koreans Naval Vessel, Gunpowder
Plumed Archer PlumedArcher Mayan unique unit. Strong, fast, well-armored archer with less attack than other archers. Mayans Archer
Conquistador Conquistador Spanish unique unit. Mounted Hand Cannoneer. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range. Spanish Cavalry, Gunpowder
Missionary Missionary Spanish unique unit. Mounted Monk. Converts enemy units and heals friendly units like Monks, but cannot pick up Relics. Spanish Cavalry, Monk, Healer
Kamayuk Kamayuk Inca unique unit. Infantry unit with attack bonus vs. cavalry. Carries a long spear to infiltrate formations. Incas Infantry
Slinger Slinger Inca unique unit. Ranged unit with attack bonus vs. infantry. Incas Archer
Elephant Archer ElephantArcher Indian unique unit. Heavy mounted archer. Indians Cavalry, Archer
Imperial Camel Rider ImperialCamelRider Stronger than Heavy Camel. Excels at killing other mounted units. Indians Cavalry
Genoese Crossbowman GenoeseCrossbowman Italian unique unit. Anti cavalry archery unit. Italians Archer
Condottiero Condottiero Italian mercenary unit. Quick infantry. Italians Infantry
Magyar Huszar MagyarHuszar Magyar unique unit. Light cavalry unit with a bonus vs. siege Magyars Cavalry
Boyar Boyar Slavic Unique Unit. Heavily armored cavalry; resistant to melee attack. Slavs Cavalry
Camel Archer CamelArcher Berber unique unit. Cavalry archer with an attack bonus vs. cavalry archers. Berbers Cavalry, Archer
Genitour Genitour Berber unique unit. Mounted Skirmisher. Berbers Cavalry, Archer
Shotel Warrior ShotelWarrior Ethiopian unique unit. Cheap infantry unit with high creation speed. Ethiopians Infantry
Gbeto Gbeto Malian unique unit. Quick infantry unit with a high ranged attack. Malians Infantry
Organ Gun OrganGun Portuguese unique unit. Siege weapon that fires a volley of bullets. Very effective against large groups of units. Portuguese Siege, Gunpowder
Caravel Caravel Portuguese unique unit. Boat effective vs. large fleets because each shot damages multiple units. Portuguese Naval Vessel
Arambai Arambai Burmese unique unit. Mounted dart thrower. Burmese Cavalry, Archer
Ballista Elephant BallistaElephant Khmer unique unit. Heavy cavalry equipped with a Scorpion. Can fell trees. Khmer Cavalry, Siege
Karambit Warrior KarambitWarrior Malay unique unit. Cheap and weak infantry unit that only takes half a population spot. Malay Infantry
Rattan Archer RattanArcher Vietnamese unique unit. Heavily armored Archer. Vietnamese Archer
Imperial Skirmisher ImperialSkirmisher Stronger than Elite Skirmisher. Ranged unit equipped with armor vs. archer attacks. Vietnamese Archer
Konnik Konnik Bulgarian unique cavalry unit that fights on as infantry when felled. Bulgarians Cavalry, Infantry
Kipchak Kipchak Cuman unique cavalry archer with rapid-fire attack. Cumans Cavalry, Archer
Leitis Leitis Lithuanian unique cavalry unit with attack that ignores armor. Lithuanians Cavalry
Keshik Keshik Tatar unique cavalry unit that generates gold when fighting other units. Tatars Cavalry
Flaming Camel FlamingCamel Incendiary camel loaded with flammable hay and brush. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry. Self-destructs when used. Tatars Suicide
